text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.title: Textures+ Mod Settings
text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.option.a: Prevents the downloading button from freezing minecraft,
creates issues with resourcepacks disabling themselves
text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.option.m: Hide some variants of entities (Angry dogs/bees)
text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.option.s: If false, sorts by number of entities
text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.option.d: DO NOT ENABLE IF YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS.
Generates world from local cloned repository in resourcepack folder
instead of the one downloaded from the mod.
text.autoconfig.texturesplusmod.option.e: Generate armor stand with every elytra in the generated world (LAGGY)
texturesplusmod.reload.text: A Resource Pack reload is required to apply the newly-downloaded Textures+ packs, reload now?
